CustomField.defaultValue: "1) What is your campaign about: <fill in text>" &br()& "2) What is the action you want sellers to take: <fill in text>" &br()& "3) Other information <fill in text>"

CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please fill in details of your campaign and any other information that can support your request.
CustomField.label: Description
